unit.comment: /** * 172. Factorial Trailing Zeroes * * Given an integer n, return the number of trailing zeroes in n!. * * Example 1: * Input: 3 * Output: 0 * Explanation: 3! = 6, no trailing zero. * * Example 2: * Input: 5 * Output: 1 * Explanation: 5! = 120, one trailing zero. * Note: Your solution should be in logarithmic time complexity. */
